summary: Challenging new boss battles you unlock after completing major quest lines. Fight for special rewards using the help of a new adventurer store!
descriptionHtml:
[size=40][u]Hall of Champions[/u][/size]

[size=12]***Requires Dragonborn***[/size]

[size=12][u]What it does![/u][/size]


-Adds Boss battles to fit Companions,College of Winterhold, The Dark Brotherhood, Thieves guild, Main Quest line, and Dragonborn\'s Main Quest.
-Adds 6 sets of special armor designed to fit the corresponding faction. (makes use of unobtainable clothing just sitting in the game, i.e Psijic Robe Set)
-Adds \"Champion Chests\"  located near the end of these quest lines containing loot and keys required to enter the Champions\' crypts.
-Adds the \"Hall of Champions\" tavern containg \"Ru\'Jall\'s Adventurer Supply\" where you can find just about anything you\'ll need to quest in Skyrim.
-Adds a small player loft in tavern with working mannequins 

[size=12][u]Compatabilty/Requirements[/u][/size]

[b]*****Requires Dragonborn*****[/b]
-Should be compatible with almost any mod. I know of no mods that use the same cell location, if you run into any problems please leave a comment so I can help troubleshoot!

[size=12][u]Trouble Finding the keys?[/u][/size]

The Dragon Key
-In Sovngarde by the whale bridge
-On the Throat of the World

The Gray Key
-Thieves Guild Tribute Chest
-Irkngthand: under the snow elf statue

The Warrior Key
-On the exit path form Ysgramor\'s Tomb

The Assasisn Key
-Katriah emperor\'s quarters

The Pawn Key
-On top of the tower where you battle Miraak, can get there by reading the corresponding black book

The Mage Key
-On the Arch Mage\'s Quarters roof

For the lazy ones out there, there is a chest containing all of the keys in the back of the catacombs. The chest is named \"Gravedigger\'s Chest\"


[size=12]Please enjoy! I\'d love to see any feedback and pictures you post![/size]

~811tantan
author: 811tantan
